message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $200 is my starting point, I could come down to $170. I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price for the value you're getting.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $170, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
